title: 420: The Examined Year - 2016
itunes:author: Philosophy Talk Starters
itunes:summary:
More at https://philosophytalk.org/shows/examined-year-2016.

The annus horrbilis that was 2016 is over. But what ideas and events took shape over the past year that challenged our assumptions and made us think about things in new ways? Join John and Ken as they celebrate the examined year with a philosophical look back at a year of triumph and defeat in sports, politics, and technology with journalist David Johnson, philosopher Debra Satz, and political scientist Margaret Levi.
itunes:subtitle: More at https://philosophytalk.org/shows/examinedâ€¦
description:
More at https://philosophytalk.org/shows/examined-year-2016.

The annus horrbilis that was 2016 is over. But what ideas and events took shape over the past year that challenged our assumptions and made us think about things in new ways? Join John and Ken as they celebrate the examined year with a philosophical look back at a year of triumph and defeat in sports, politics, and technology with journalist David Johnson, philosopher Debra Satz, and political scientist Margaret Levi.
